com.lti.utils.synchronization
Class ThreadGroupMgr

java.lang.Object
  com.lti.utils.synchronization.ThreadGroupMgr

public final class ThreadGroupMgr
extends java.lang.Object

Manages a singleton thread group. This is useful because we often want to assign all threads to a single thread group to allow centralized uncaught exception handling.

Author:
Ken Larson

static java.lang.ThreadGroup getThreadGroup()
          Returns the current thread group if it differs from the main thread group, otherwise it returns the default thread group.
